page.title: 15Kington :General Family Life
page.content: Women still seem to do the main part of cooking and preparing food, but men and children are catching on to the idea of joint work around the house. The cooking of food in Kington is done usually by electricity but some people have gas tanks in their gardens so that they can use gas in the house. Wood burning cookers are also used. Pets around the house are usually cats and dogs but people are starting to have hamsters and animals like fish. Tinned pet foods are used mainly for feeding animals. During the week people usually eat their main meal at night, consisting of a meat, vegetables and potatoes, but at the weekend people eat their main meal at midday. It is traditional to have a roast lunch on Sundays.
